    public class DatePicker
extends ListView
implements android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener
    Created by Rey on 12/31/2014.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  DatePicker.OnDateChangedListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the selected date is changed.

                int minMonth,
                int minYear,
                int maxDay,
                int maxMonth,
                int maxYear)
        Set the range of selectable dates.
        Parameters:
        minDay - The day value of minimum date.
        minMonth - The month value of minimum date.
        minYear - The year value of minimum date.
        maxDay - The day value of maximum date.
        maxMonth - The month value of maximum date.
        maxYear - The year value of maximum date.
